Description: A: Fragment of ear-or hair-ring made of shell, subtle angular edges, one end broken off, well smoothed. Four beads of different sizes and material: B: lentoid-shaped bead made of stone in a whitish-transparent colour C: disc-shaped bead made of ostrich eggshell, roughly rounded D: two segmented cylindrical beads of slightly different diameter, made of whitish faience, broken off
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E12.6F, lowest level
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
